author: wangsijie
message:
docs: add Logto auth library (#75176)

### What?

Add [Logto](https://logto.io) to the auth libraries list.

### Why?

Logto has official Next.js SDK with a well documented quick start guide.
Logto is an open-source Auth0 alternative for modern apps and SaaS
products, supporting OIDC, OAuth 2.0 and SAML open standards for
authentication and authorization.

### How?

Co-authored-by: Zack Tanner <1939140+ztanner@users.noreply.github.com>

files.patch:
@@ -1626,6 +1626,7 @@ Now that you've learned about authentication in Next.js, here are Next.js-compat
 - [Auth0](https://auth0.com/docs/quickstart/webapp/nextjs/01-login)
 - [Clerk](https://clerk.com/docs/quickstarts/nextjs)
 - [Kinde](https://kinde.com/docs/developer-tools/nextjs-sdk)
+- [Logto](https://docs.logto.io/quick-starts/next-app-router)
 - [NextAuth.js](https://authjs.dev/getting-started/installation?framework=next.js)
 - [Ory](https://www.ory.sh/docs/getting-started/integrate-auth/nextjs)
 - [Stack Auth](https://docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/setup)
